analysis.description:
CryptonomicaVerification.withdrawAllToWithdrawalAddress (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#323-339) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! withdrawalAddress.send(this.balance) (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#333-338)
CryptonomicaVerification.stringToBytes32 (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#98-112) is declared view but contains assembly code

CryptonomicaVerification.addVerificationData (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#186-244) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(verificationAddedOn[_acc] == 0)
i in CryptonomicaVerification.bytes32ToString (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#126) is a local variable never initialiazed

CryptonomicaVerification.uploadSignedString (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#132-182) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- signedStringUploadedOnUnixTime[msg.sender] != 0 (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#154-158)

CryptonomicaVerification.addVerificationData (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#186-244) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(signedStringUploadedOnUnixTime[_acc] != 0) (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#210-211)
	- require(bool)(verificationAddedOn[_acc] == 0) (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#215)

CryptonomicaVerification.stringToBytes32 uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#98-112)
	- /unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#112
CryptonomicaVerification.stringToSignExample should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#57-60)
CryptonomicaVerification.bytes32ToString (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#116-129) should be declared external
CryptonomicaVerification.uploadSignedString (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#132-182) should be declared external
CryptonomicaVerification.addVerificationData (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#186-244) should be declared external
CryptonomicaVerification.revokeVerification (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#256-271) should be declared external
CryptonomicaVerification.changeOwnerStart (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#283-288) should be declared external
CryptonomicaVerification.changeOwnerAccept (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#293-298) should be declared external
CryptonomicaVerification.addManager (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#300-305) should be declared external
CryptonomicaVerification.removeManager (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#308-311) should be declared external
CryptonomicaVerification.setPriceForVerification (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#313-319) should be declared external
CryptonomicaVerification.withdrawAllToWithdrawalAddress (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#323-339) should be declared external
CryptonomicaVerification.setWithdrawalAddress (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#342-349) should be declared external
CryptonomicaVerification.fixWithdrawalAddress (/unique_contracts/0x846942953c3b2a898f10df1e32763a823bf6b27f.sol#353-359) should be declared external
